effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.black_white: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
